name: Leaning 90/90
desc: Start by sitting on the floor with your legs stretched out in front of you. Bend your knees so that they form a 90-degree angle, with your feet planted on the ground. Ensure that your hips and knees align with each other. Next, let your knees fall to one side so that your knees are against the floor while maintaining a 90-degree bend at your knees. Place your hands behind you and keep your back straight.
